00024 #ifndef ABSTRACTSERIALENGINE_H
00025 #define ABSTRACTSERIALENGINE_H
00026 
00027 #include "abstractserial.h"
00028 
00029 class AbstractSerialEnginePrivate;
00030 class AbstractSerialEngine : public QObject
00031 {
00032     Q_OBJECT
00033 public:
00034     explicit AbstractSerialEngine(QObject *parent = 0);
00035     virtual ~AbstractSerialEngine();
00036 
00037     static AbstractSerialEngine *createSerialEngine(QObject *parent);
00038 
00039     //my impl (device parameters and controls)
00040     void setDeviceName(const QString &deviceName);
00041     virtual bool setBaudRate(AbstractSerial::BaudRate baudRate) = 0;
00042     virtual bool setDataBits(AbstractSerial::DataBits dataBits) = 0;
00043     virtual bool setParity(AbstractSerial::Parity parity) = 0;
00044     virtual bool setStopBits(AbstractSerial::StopBits stopBits) = 0;
00045     virtual bool setFlowControl(AbstractSerial::Flow flow) = 0;
00046     virtual bool setCharIntervalTimeout(int msecs) = 0;
00047 
00048     virtual bool open(QIODevice::OpenMode mode) = 0;
00049     virtual void close() = 0;
00050     virtual bool flush() = 0;
00051     virtual bool reset() = 0;
00052 
00053     //управление линиями DTR, RTS (control DTR and RTS lines)
00054     virtual bool setDtr(bool set) = 0;
00055     virtual bool setRts(bool set) = 0;
00056     //получение статуса линий DSR, RTS и т.п. (get state DSR and RTS lines)
00057     virtual ulong lineStatus() = 0;
00058 
00059     virtual qint64 bytesAvailable(bool wait) = 0;
00060 
00061     virtual qint64 read(char *data, qint64 maxSize) = 0;
00062     virtual qint64 write(const char *data, qint64 maxSize) = 0;
00063 
00064     virtual bool waitForRead(int msecs = 3000, bool *timedOut = 0) const = 0;
00065     virtual bool waitForWrite(int msecs = 3000, bool *timedOut = 0) const = 0;
00066     virtual bool waitForReadOrWrite(bool *readyToRead, bool *readyToWrite,
00067                 bool checkRead, bool checkWrite,
00068                 int msecs = 3000, bool *timedOut = 0) const = 0;
00069 
00070     //my impl
00071     QString deviceName() const;
00072     AbstractSerial::BaudRate baudRate() const;
00073     AbstractSerial::DataBits dataBits() const;
00074     AbstractSerial::Parity parity() const;
00075     AbstractSerial::StopBits stopBits() const;
00076     AbstractSerial::Flow flow() const;
00077     int charIntervalTimeout() const;
00078     //
00079     AbstractSerial::Status status() const;
00080 
00081     virtual bool isReadNotificationEnabled() const = 0;
00082     virtual void setReadNotificationEnabled(bool enable) = 0;
00083 
00084 Q_SIGNALS:
00085     void readNotification();
00086 
00087 protected:
00088     AbstractSerialEnginePrivate * const d_ptr;
00089     AbstractSerialEngine(AbstractSerialEnginePrivate &dd, QObject *parent);
00090     //add 05.11.2009
00091     virtual qint64 currentTxQueue() const = 0;
00092     virtual qint64 currentRxQueue() const = 0;
00093 
00094 private:
00095     Q_DECLARE_PRIVATE(AbstractSerialEngine)
00096     Q_DISABLE_COPY(AbstractSerialEngine)
00097 };
00098 
00099 class AbstractSerialEnginePrivate
00100 {
00101 public:
00102     AbstractSerialEnginePrivate();
00103     virtual ~AbstractSerialEnginePrivate();
00104 
00105     QString m_deviceName;
00106     AbstractSerial::BaudRate m_baudRate;
00107     AbstractSerial::DataBits m_dataBits;
00108     AbstractSerial::Parity m_parity;
00109     AbstractSerial::StopBits m_stopBits;
00110     AbstractSerial::Flow m_flow;
00111 
00112     int m_charIntervalTimeout;
00113 
00114     AbstractSerial::Status m_status;
00115 
00116     bool m_oldSettingsIsSaved;
00117 };
